graha, tharu gana unanduwak dakwu galiliyoge samakalinayan wishwasa kale wasara kihipayakata warak senasuruge walalu atharin pruthiwiya ringa yana bawa ya. 1659 di me walaluwala jyamithika swabhawayak hewath hadayak athi bawa kristiyan hiyujanas namaththa kiweya. 1977 wanathuruth mebandu walaluwalin samanwitha ekama graha wasthuwa angaharu bawa pruthiwi wasinge wishwasaya wiya.
